name: ESTATE OF Rev. Stanislas A. DREIER, Deceased. Appeal of Edmund DREIER

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Rev. Stanislas A. DREIER, Deceased. Appeal of Edmund DREIER.

opinions.text:
DECREE
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Elliot B. Edley, Edwardsville, Allen T. Reishtein, Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Conrad Falvello, Sugarloaf, for Msgr. Piorkowski.
Paula Garrety, Harrisburg, Michael J. Hudacek, Plymouth, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 105
ESTATE OF Rev. Stanislas A. DREIER, Deceased. Appeal of Edmund DREIER.
No. 80-3-577.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 20, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Elliot B. Edley, Edwardsville, Allen T. Reishtein, Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Conrad Falvello, Sugarloaf, for Msgr. Piorkowski.
Paula Garrety, Harrisburg, Michael J. Hudacek, Plymouth, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
